DOC.brief_summary: SCORE active , prospective , non-randomized , multi-center outcome-oriented registry patient implant St Jude Medical ( SJM ) market-released cardiac rhythm management ( CRM ) product . This registry conduct United States ( US ) . The primary purpose registry evaluate publish acute long-term performance market-released SJM CRM product analyze product survival probability . Product status related adverse event collect measure survival probability .
DOC.brief_title: St. Jude Medical Product Longevity Performance ( SCORE ) Registry
DOC.criteria: Enrollment Criteria : Patient standard indication CRM implantable device . Patient implant least one new marketreleased SJM CRM product list provide SJM ( e.g pacemaker , ICD , CRTD , CRTP , pacing/sensing lead , defibrillation lead ) within last 90 day . Complete system implant information ( e.g . model , serial number , location ) available enrollment . Any productrelated adverse event information implant available enrollment . Patient appropriate legal guardian willing provide authorization registry participation .
